oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Knoxville, Tennessee, from Mabry's Hill
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Panoramic views; Farmhouses; Trees; Dirt roads; Hills
Agriculture; Panoramas; Knoxville (Tenn.) - History - 19th century; Forts & fortifications - Tennessee - Knoxville - 1860-1870
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Panoramic drawing of Knoxville (Tenn.) from Mabry's Hill with points of interests labeled: Sevierville Hill, Fort Stanley, Fort Dickinson, Methodist Hill, and Temperance Hill.
The text on the lower left portion of the image denotes that this panorama accompanied a report made by Captain O.M. Poe of the U.S. Engineers. Series 1.VOL.XXXI. PART 1.PAGE 314.
